definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. [[שְׁלָָם]] Job 22:21 be at peace (in covt.); Pt. sf. [[שׁוֹלְמִי]] Ps 7:5 i.e. my ally, friend (cf. Ps 41:10); Pt. pass cstr. 2Sa 20:19, read [[שָׂמוּ]] LXX Ew:G iii. 264 Dr (cf. We) HPS and mod.

definitions.title: Pu.

make peace with, [[אֶת]], Jos 10:1, Jos 10:4, 2Sa 10:19 = 1Ch 19:19 ([[עִם]]); [[עִם]] De 20:12, 1Ki 22:45; c. [[אֶל]] pregn. Jos 11:19 submitting unto.
cause to be at peace, [[אֶת]], Pr 16:7.
